snippet: Carnegie Hall and its stagehands have settled the yearlong contract dispute that led to the cancellation of Carnegie’s opening-night concert.
abstract: Carnegie Hall and Local 1 of the International Alliance of Theatrical Stage Employees, union representing hall's stagehands, settle yearlong contract dispute that led to two-day strike and cancellation of Carnegie’s opening-night concert; union had been fighting to ensure its members would work in new educational spaces that Carnegie is building above the hall.
lead_paragraph: Carnegie Hall and its stagehands have settled the yearlong contract dispute that led to the cancellation of Carnegie’s opening-night concert.

headline.main: Carnegie Hall and Stagehands Settle Contract Dispute
headline.print_headline: Compromise Settles Strike By Carnegie Stagehands
